QuestData.Title: Corki's Gone Missing Again!
QuestData.Description: <Arechron sighs.>$B$BThis is so embarrassing. Do you remember my boy, Corki? You rescued him from the Burning Blade Ruins recently. Well, his curiosity has gotten the best of him once more. He told me that he was going to investigate the Boulderfist menace for 'uncle' Mo'mor and ran off to the ogre mounds in the Halaani Basin, north of here.$B$BDo you think you could track him down? I would be eternally grateful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Arechron at Telaar has asked that you find and free Corki.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you so much, $n. His mother will deal with him from now on.
